title: Butter Dish With Fork, ca. 1935
dimensions:
Dish (a): H x diam.: 7 x 16 cm (2 3/4 x 6 5/16 in.)
Fork (b): L x W x D: 17.1 x 0.5 x 0.6 cm (6 3/4 x 3/16 x 1/4 in.)
description: Circular, wide-rimmed dish (a) decorated with horizontal striations on exterior;  contains removeable piereced circular strainer (c); circular lid (b) with yellow Bekelite knop and notched at edge to accept long-handled three-pronged fork (d).

tombstone.epitaph:
Butter Dish With Fork, ca. 1935.
ca. 1935. Chrome-plated metal, Bakelite. Gift of Mel Byars. 1991-59-132-a/d.
